pkgmetadata.longdescription: Python client for the biglocalnews.org API## Links- Documentation: [bln-python-client.readthedocs.io](https://bln-python-client.readthedocs.io/)- Repository: [github.com/biglocalnews/bln-python-client](https://github.com/biglocalnews/bln-python-client)- Packaging: [pypi.org/project/bln](https://pypi.org/project/bln/)## AboutThe project is sponsored by [Big Local News](https://biglocalnews.org/#/about), a program at Stanford University that collects data for impactful journalism. The code is maintained by Stanford Lecturer [Serdar Tumgoren](https://comm.stanford.edu/faculty-tumgoren/) and [Ben Welsh](https://palewi.re/who-is-ben-welsh/), a visiting data journalist from the Los Angeles Times.
